contentrichtext.text: <!-- This article is a part of [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Aircraft]]. Please see [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Aircraft/page content]] for recommended layout. --> {|{{Infobox Aircraft Begin |name=Yokosuka MXY9 "''Shuka''" |image= |caption= }}{{Infobox Aircraft Type |type=[[Trainer (aircraft)|Trainer]] |manufacturer= |designer=[[Yokosuka Naval Air Technical Arsenal|Yokosuka]] |first flight= |introduced= |retired= |status= |primary user= |more users= |produced= |number built= |unit cost= |developed from = [[Yokosuka MXY8]] |variants with their own articles= |developed into = }} |} The '''[[Yokosuka Naval Air Technical Arsenal|Yokosuka]] MXY9 ''Shuka''''' (秋火, "Autumn fire") was a projected development of the [[Yokosuka MXY8|MXY8]] [[Flight training|training]] [[Military glider|glider]], adding a small [[thermojet]]-style [[jet engine]], the [[Tsu-11]]. It was intended to provide further training for pilots who were to fly the [[Mitsubishi J8M]] and [[Mitsubishi Ki-200]] [[Rocket engine|rocket]]-powered [[interceptor aircraft]].<ref name=Dyer>{{cite book|last=Dyer|first=Edwin M.|title=Japanese Secret Projects|year=2009|publisher=Midland Publishing|location=Hinkley|isbn=978 1857803 174|pages=77}}</ref> None were built prior to [[Japan]]'s surrender and the end of [[World War II]]. ==Specifications (MXY9, as designed)== {{aircraft specifications |plane or copter?=plane |jet or prop?=jet |ref=<ref name=Dyer/> |crew=one, pilot |capacity= |payload main= |payload alt= |length main=19 ft 10 in |length alt=6.05 m |span main=31 ft 2 in |span alt=9.50 m |height main=8 ft 10 in |height alt=2.70 m |area main=190 ft² |area alt=17.7 m² |airfoil= |empty weight main= |empty weight alt= |loaded weight main= |loaded weight alt= |useful load main= |useful load alt= |max takeoff weight main= |max takeoff weight alt= |more general= |engine (jet)=[[Tsu-11]] |type of jet=thermojet |number of jets=1 |thrust main=1.7 kN |thrust alt=396 lbf |thrust original= |afterburning thrust main= |afterburning thrust alt= |engine (prop)= |type of prop= |number of props= |power main= |power alt= |power original= |max speed main= |max speed alt= |cruise speed main= |cruise speed alt= |stall speed main= |stall speed alt= |never exceed speed main= |never exceed speed alt= |range main= |range alt= |ceiling main= |ceiling alt= |climb rate main= |climb rate alt= |loading main= |loading alt= |thrust/weight= |power/mass main= |power/mass alt= |more performance= |armament= |avionics= }} ==See also== {{aircontent| |related= *[[Mitsubishi J8M]] *[[Yokosuka MXY8]] |similar aircraft= |lists= *[[List of military aircraft of Japan]] }} ==Notes==
